choices: She finds a particularly odd idea for a photo shoot
She decides to go clothes shopping
She decides to get someting to eat
112.content:
Beccabae had been a member of the Big Cuties page for a fairly short while, but had become one of the more popular characters on the site. She enjoyed the cash she was making off this as she found herself beginning to lounge around the house in her "Pear-chan" pajamas all day or in less. The money was helping to pay for all the extra food she needed to keep up her figure, and the clothes she needed to keep up with her.

"Sigh," she said one day while looking through her clothes. "I need something sexy for my next shoot, but I've worn all these before. Oh man, this is so boring, I need something new," she said as she flicked her long reddish hair out of her eyes. "Then again considering what site I belong to, maybe I don't need that many clothes," she said with a giggle. She considered what clothes she should buy or what foods she should eat as she began going through all the comments that had been left for her by her fans, looking to see if there was any sort of idea from them on what her next shoot should be about.
112.title: Beccabae

choices: She lets out a belch, she's in!
She thinks and needs more persuasion....
The email has a hypnotic effect on her...
1121.content:
She clicked open her email and found only one new message waiting. It was titled "Transformation", she smiled hoping this was the new idea she was looking for!
She popped a chocolate into her mouth, savoring the sweet taste as she clicked open the email.

"Hello Madam,

Before you reject my suggestion, I hope you will at least hear me out. I am a man of considerable power and influence, while this influence denies me the ability to introduce myself it does afford me the chance to richly reward you should to do what I request.

While your growing figure is very attractive, there is so much more you could do to gain weight..Do you have any idea how many calories bathing burns away? Or how many changing your clothes everyday burns away?
I'm sure you've withheld yourself from certain indulgences. Wouldn't it feel great to lay in bed all day eating filling your fat belly, and not getting up for anything!? To feel the natural oils and smells of your body make you bigger at fatter, and thus make you more money? To feel all of the gassy greasy fatty foods you've eaten take their full effect on your body. Holding nothing back as they bring out your inner slob. I want to pay you to become completely lazy, fat and unkept in every sense of the words. I will pay you 5 million dollars to show me this most beautiful and sensual transformation.
Yours truly,
An Admirer "

Pushing back from her chair she thought over the decision.
1121.title: She finds a particularly odd idea for a photo s...

choices: She kept eating till her outer layer of clothes ripped off
Gets on her hands and knees and starts eating face first
11213.content:
"Wow, Five Million?" she said stunned, "No way is that real, this is just a joke. No way am I going to... to..." she suddenly started feeling a warm light wash over her. She started to think about the proposition and thought "Hey why not? I work too hard for this. I became a model because it was supposed to be easy. Snap some shots of my butt and be done for the day but now I have to... change clothes... and shower..." she said thinking of all the hard work that went into being clean. She unbuttoned her jeans and already felt more at ease. Although letting this stomach hang out caused her to realize how hungry she was.

Beccabae stood up and made her way to the kitchen, forgetting to reply to the email and already thinking about how hard walking is. She for a moment contemplated getting some kind of wheeled device like roller skates or just one of those big circular rolling things that babies have. "Yeah, that's the life," she said as if daydreaming and sighing at the same time. She shook this off and wondered where that thought came from and continued to the kitchen. She opened the fridge and noticed it was fully packed and began to salivate just looking at it all. She started grabbing slices of ham and mustard and didn't even bother putting it on a plate or combining it with bread, or even combining them together as she just shoved the ham in her mouth and began sucking down the mustard and squirting it into her mouth. "oh god, oh god it's sooooo gooood," she said in an ecstatic daze.
11213.title: The email has a hypnotic effect on her...

choices: Sneak outside to grab some bigger ones without being seen

112131.content:
The food was so good, she kept eating one slice of meat after another, one piece of pie after another, one bag of cookie until it was all gone and moved on to the next. Her bra started to grab tightly against her chest, her panties wedged into the valley that was her rump, as her sweat started to build and she felt herself growing lethargic. She reached one jiggling arm up until she finally grabbed the last bit of pumpkin pie. She crammed it into her face, orange moosh covering her lips, and her bra snapped off and flew cross the room. "Oh, *gulp* oh wow, I guess I might have overdone it, maybe I should have been *uuuurp* tape recording this." She chuckled to herself as she struggled to her feet, her newfound massive stomach swaying between her stomach and her hips slapping back and forth as she swayed back and forth. She finally got to her feet, feeling exhausted as she wheezed from her three chinned face, and her stomach drooped down below her waistline. She took a deep breath and felt her stomach start to gurgle. She went to let out another burp but what came out was a *FRRRP* She blushed as she realized this release of gas caused her panties to snap off, leaving her accidently naked there in the kitchen.

"Ooh, that, that was a little shocking, didn't mean to do that... although it didn't feel too bad actually," she said almost afraid to admit it. "Although it *urp* bring up a problem," she thought as she wiped her mouth clean. "Those were my biggest pair of clothes."
112131.title: She kept eating till her outer layer of clothes...

"Is someone hungry." She said as her stomach growled out as if answering.

choices: She doesn't care and keeps eating
11231.content:
"You know, it's been a while since I've had some good Mexican," she said as she looked at the menu for a Mexican restaurant in a shopping district she had never been to. "Los Slobos," she read intrigued, "I wonder what that means." The answer came in the form of another growl from her stomach, causing her to giggle and say, "Alright, I guess its not that important."

She put on a pink spaghetti string top and her favorite pair of pokemon panties (always loved to have something with pikachu on it nearby at all times) and covered it up with a pair of black pants that were quickly becoming skin tight. She set off to the strip mall where Los Slobos was located and was almost knocked over as soon as she got out of the car and smelt the rush of greasy Mexican Food rush over her. "Oh that smells like heaven," she thought as she entered. The restaurant was fairly busy but when she came in they still acted like they were happy to see her (possibly because judging from her size they knew how much she would order). They waiter lead her to a booth and started her off with a complimentary plate of nachos.

"Ooh, now this is my kind of service," she said as she grabbed a bean and cheese covered chip and delicately chomped away at it. Even when she was eating something covered in so much fat, she made sure to look dainty and adorable while doing it. She placed her order and kept working on the nachos until she got halfway through and felt a slight rumble in her stomach. "Hmm, maybe I ate too fa*FRRT*"

Beccabae looked up in confusion, she didn't want to admit that that had come from her but it clearly did. "Oh my," she though, "didn't even feel that one coming out, luckily nobody noticed." She didn't have time to think about it much longer as her order of three burritos and a side order of ribs were brought out to her. "Oh thank you," she said very politely to the staff as she picked up the hefty spicy looking burrito. She took a bite and felt her mouth explode with the flavors that were making their way down her throat. She didn't know what came over her but it was so good she couldn't help but wolf it down. "Man that was delico*UUUUURP*" She quickly covered her mouth and let out a small "Excuse me," followed by a giggle.

Ignoring what had just happened she got back to the remaining two burritos and made quick work of them. She was about to finish off with the ribs that were literally dripping in sauce, when right after taking her first bite she felt a quick grumble in her stomach. She attempted to adjust her stomach while taking another bite in order to ease the pressure, but the moment she lifted up her right butt cheek a mighty *FFRRTATAAAAP* erupted from her rear. "Oh, um, uh," she said not knowing what to say as she could tell people were now staring at the farting girl with a mouth full of food, "I uh *FFRRRP* um *FRRRTAAATAAAPAP*"
11231.title: Mexican (Gassy)

1153322121.content:
After thinking about it a idea popped in her head she would go see her friend Justin they knew each other since back in high school and stayed good friends since than Justin was very smart person and always loved to take good challenges this would be just up his ally.

She quickly got dressed in pair of tight pants and shirt that was slightly to small for her than got on a pair of shoes before grabbing her car keys and headed out. It took her a forty minutes to reach his flat after finding a good parking spot she got out and headed to the door. After knocking there was no answer but she knew he was here he rarely self his flat plus she could see his car on the side of the street, she knocked a few more times after no answer she tried to turn the knob. Only to find it locked but she remembered where he kept a spare key once she got it she unlocked the door and poked her head in not seeing anyone she came fully in and shut the door behind her.

"Justin, mate you here." She called out as she walked further into the flat she took a set of stairs down to a basement knowing he turned it in a lab she was only a few feet from the door when it slammed open with smoke pouring out and a man coming through.

"cough...cough, ok those two don't mix well together." The man said when the smoke cleared a bit more she saw a man with short but shaggy dark brown hair a average body type that had some muscle but not to much the person wore dark blue jeans with a black shirt and a white lab coat over it.

"Another experiment go bad mate." Bonnie said smirking

"Bonnie when did you get here." Justin said surprised to see the chunky girl

"Just a few minutes ago I knocked but you never answered." Bonnie said with a small chuckle at him

"Oh did you sorry I really do need to get a doorbell installed." Justin said blushing a bit from embarrassment

"Well when you do make sure you have it to where you can hear it in your self made lab ok." Bonnie said with a smile

"I will do that. So what brings you here huh need me to go with you shopping again to find new outfits for your modeling job?" Justin said with a nod before asking that with a slight smile

"Sorry mate not this time I actually have a big favor to ask." She said with her own smile, with that she lead him back up stairs where he made a cup of tea for himself and her a cup of hot chocolate with extra chocolate made into it for her once they where seated she explain what she wanted him to do.

"Your asking me for a really really big favor you know." Justin said emphasizing the really part as he gave her a small frown as he tapped his spoon on his tea cup just having stirred it a bit

"I know but if anyone can do it I'm sure you can after all your so smart especial when it comes to chemicals and all that stuff, its like your that potions master from Harry Potter." Bonnie said smiling

"Hehehe...I don't know if should take that as a compliment or a insult after all he was a biggit of a man." Justin chuckled at her before sipping some of his tea

"I mean skill wise your smart ass." She said shaking her head and rolling her eyes

"But come on I can use your help I mean eating and all is great but its such a slow process I want to get bigger faster I want my beauty and sexiness to grow and people to see it come on don't you want to see me nice and bigger to making my big body jiggle and all." She pleaded than smirked at the end

This caused Justin to blush a bit he was just glad he was drinking his tea hoping the cup blocked her from seeing his blush, ever since he met her and she started to gain weight to be a BBW model he discovered his hidden love for big women. Especial when it came to Bonnie as he always had a small crush on her though never sure if she liked him back since she always was a bit of a flirt, but still he loved her plump body and though wouldn't admit it out-loud to her had dreams or fantasies of her getting fatter and bigger. Hell maybe if he could pull this off it might make her like him back and maybe they could get to gather he could be her feeder helping her get fatter with the stuff he made for her.

"Well ok I will do it for you." He said once he thought his blushed died down lowering the cup from his lips, she looked all gitty as she started to clap her hands happily and was about to get up to hug him when he put a hand up to stop her.

"Wait before you get to excited you should know this won't be something I just whip up like making a cake this will take time to make I mean I could be at this for a month to as far as maybe a year or more." He told her with a serious look

"Oh why so long." She pouts out unhappily

"Because this is chemicals Bonnie I just can't through some things together and presto you have something to help you gain weight I got to mix things together find out what will work best how things react if I mix them and most importantly how it will work when I let something living test it out. I mean I could make something that won't have any effect on you or can cause you to blow up like a balloon so fast you pop like one." He started to explain to her

"I like the second one just try to minus the popping." She said with a large smile

"Or what I make could kill you." He finished saying making a serious look that make her giggle

"Ok, ok I get it let you do your stuff test it out but as soon as it reacts good to your little lab rats you got to call me and give it to me ok." She said giggling still a bit but she knew she was defeated.

"Good and I will Bonnie you know you can count on me." He said smiling, both than got up as she gave him the hug

"But try and make it fast please I want to really start getting fatter faster as soon as I can." She said as she hugged him

"I will do my best for you mate." Justin said as he hugged her back enjoying her plump body against his and started to image a bit how it would feel if she was even bigger luckily he was able to keep his excitement down so she wouldn't have any embarrassing moments with her.

Once the two let go she went back home to do her normal stuff while he went to work in his lap it was about two and half weeks later that Bonnie got a call to come over he told her this time to just come in and come down to the lap. When she got there she found the door unlocked this time and she went straight down to the lap finding a big room that looked to be half the size of Justin's flat it was white with a assortment of things all over the place. But what draw her attention was Justin who was in the middle of the room with a large smile on his face with a table behind him, she couldn't see what was on the table as he seemed to be blocking it.

"Glad you got here mate I got some big news for you." Justin said smiling

"Oh what's that." She asked curiously with her own smile

"I finished what you wanted." He said happily

"You mean." She started saying but couldn't seem to finish it as if she where to say it, she would just wake up from some kind of dream

"Yes I finished what could help you gain weight much faster." Justin said stepping away from the table to reveal...?

11533221212.content:
Behind him as a large plastic white bucket of a gooy green sauce looking stuff her nose wrinkled a bit as she turned to Justin pointing at it.

"This stuff is suppose to help me gain the weight I want faster?" She asked him as if he was playing a joke on her

"I know its not pretty but it will help you gain weight just some here I'll show you." Justin said leading her from the goop to a wall that had some cages she looked into three he pointed at only to see three large guinea pigs.

"Look at them closely." He told her seeing her confused look, when she did that was when she gasp and notice they weren't guinea pigs but three very fat rats that where almost half the size of a rabbit.

"Yep for a moment I almost thought that stuff was a failure as two of the rats didn't seem to gain but than notice the third was had gotten fatter a bit I continued than and well now you see the results." He explained to her in scientist mode now as the looked at the three rats himself

"But three there three fat rats mate I thought you said only one got fat?" She asked him a bit confused

"Well the other two where male." He told her but she seemed more confused

"You see the third one was a female rat while the other two who didn't gain weight where males it seems some how the stuff only works on females for a odd reason that is why I tried feeding it too most of my male rats but after a taste none of them would try it finding it disgusting while this female and the other two I added seemed to love it and gain lots of weight from it." He explained further

"Wow you think this will work on only female human's too." She asked him curiously

"Mostly likely I already tried a taste of it just to see if it will be ok for humans. Don't worry I feel fine that was a few days ago I haven't gained any weight or be effected by it in any other way than the foul taste I had in my mouth for a few hours." He started to say when seeing her worried look he put her mind at easy though made a disgusting face at the end remembering the awful taste of the goop.

"Any other effects?" She asked when he mention it

"Oh yes I have notice two side effects from eating the goop 1. been that it is very addicting it seems the female rats can't get enough of the stuff it's like this stuff just gets absorbed fast by the body so making the person just want more and never really feeling and 2. it seems to also make the person eating it a bit more gassy. Any other side effects I'm not sure I have only had the rats on it for at least four days." He explained to her listing off the side effects

"Four days you mean they been just eating this goop stuff for four days and are already this big." She said more shocked with how big the rats got as she realized that her dream of getting large faster was coming truer and truer by the minute

"Well yes but two if the rats haven't just been eating the goop alone I kept the first one on just pure goop while I tried out some other stuff with the other two one I had the goop poured on food while the other one got food that had the goop mixed into the food when made. Now I discovered that the with the goop just on the food did help make the food at least three times fatter and helped it get digested faster, but food that had the goop mixed in when made, made the food many times more fattening and much more faster digested by the body so the best ways are to just eat the goop pure or mix it into any made food will be the best way to add weight to yourself." He told her smiling at the end

"Oh Justin your just so amazing if this stuff really does do this I will be huge in no time I hope you had plenty of this stuff ready." She said happily

"I thought you say that so yes I do have plenty made." He said going over to some stuff that had a large cloth over it only to pull it off and show plenty of large barrels that she was sure was full of the goop he made for her.

She clapped her hands and licked her lips as she image all the food she would eat with this stuff and well as thought of just guzzling this stuff down just by it self how her body would expand and get large with every drop of it.

Ok what happens next?

15333222211.content:
You sit, patiently waiting, in the new restaurant, El Gaseoso Burrito, for your date, the lovely Rosie Mercado. You can hardly believe you scored a date with her, part of a promotion for her web show. Suddenly, she walks through the door. She's wearing a white dress with colorful splotches all over. As she walks towards your table you realize she's much bigger in real life than you imagined. You stand up to greet her, and you get a full comparison: at 5'9 and 350 lbs she dwarfs your 4'11, 98 lb frame. She wraps you in a big bear hug, nearly smothering you with her enormous breasts, and you fail to get your arms even halfway around her body. You, being the gentleman you are, pull her chair out for her. You notice her immense 77 inch hips hang well over both sides. In addition, though you try with all your might you fail to budge her chair one inch closer to the table while attempting to scoot her in.

"I am absolutely starving! I love this place," says Rosie with glee.

When the waiter approaches you place your order, and watch as Rosie orders enough food for an army. She scarfs down burritos left and right, only stopping to let out an enormous belch, or leaning over to let out a room clearing fart. You never imagined that she could be so unashamedly gassy!

Because of the display in front of you, you haven't even touched your food by the time she stuffs the last burrito down her throat. "Are you gunna eat that?" She says, not waiting for you to reply before that too disappears down her gullet. She sighs, leans back, and rubs her now obviously visibly bloated tummy. PHHHHHHHHHHFFFFFFFFFFFFFFT, she lets out a fart that you can feel vibrating through your seat. "That was soo good! Now I want to..."
15333222211.title: Date to a new Mexican restaurant

153332222111.content:
Suddenly, the band at the restaurant puts on some quick salsa music. "C'mon, I wanna dance!" She exclaims, grabbing your arm and yanking you off your chair. She grinds her enormous ass into you, rubbing the horrible stink of her gas into you. As she bumps, grinds, and farts on you, you are slowly being forced back until you are pressed against the wall. She rubs her butt against you, slowly forcing you lower and lower down the wall with her ass, and forcing her dress higher and higher until her thong clad ass is rubbing all over your torso. Since she's so much taller than you, it doesn't take long before your face is being buried between her sweaty cheeks, as she blasts fart after fart in your face.

Finally, the song ends, and she steps away...
